tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Siddhi has been remarkable *** ****** dentist I have meet with the experience she is having and history of dental issue I have.
She is truly an  doctor plus an artist.
As a Dr she solves the dental issue and as an artist she makes one look good from the aesthetic side.

Will always recommend her...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Siddhi was very helpful in explaining the details of current status of my dental health and also precautions to take for future. The entire dental cleaning was also very smooth as Dr. Siddhi and her assistant are very well experienced. I have even recommended my family members to her and they all are very happy with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ****** ** **** ************* *** she did my treatment painlessly. What impressed me was her attention to detail and she really enjoys what she does and passionate about her profession.. 

She explains the procedure and is very patient with her patients..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Siddhi is dedicated and committed . She makes patients feel comfortable during their treatment. She is understanding and very polite. The clinic is very clean and staff make sure patients are sanitized before entering the clinic. Overall a very good experience at Core Dentistry Clinic

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,BPS Dentures Fixing,Conservative Dentistry,Endo Surgery Or Apicoectomy,Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),
review:
Absolutely speechless about the ROOT CANAL treatment and the hospitability.  I would definitely recommend to visit once who has got dental issue's. In my 47 yrs of experience i have never got such a fantastic and satisfactory treatment.  Before my 1st visit or sitting i was having deadly pains and by Gods grace i happen to be there and Dr treated me , and not exaggerating but i was so much relaxed that hardly i took painkillers. 
Kindly visit once those you have got dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had gone to the Dentist for cleaning and filling of my teeth, it was a very neat & decent clinic. She was very gentle and soft spoken * **** * **** **** ********** During the entire treatment, she made me feel easy and comfortable. It was a very good experience & also she removed my fears and myths that i had about the Dentist's by her soft treatment. She is just amazing in her work. I wish her all the success in her future life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Siddhi is extremely caring and goes above and beyond to connect with her patients and make them feel truly comfortable. She is always smiling and takes great care to explain everything she does. If something feels uncomfortable she noticed immediately and apologizes. She calls and follows up after treatment also to make sure you are feeling good. I've never met a dentist with such a great level of care.
reply_text: Thank you Gayle for your kind words..Glad that you had a good dental experience..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Siddhi is very professional. Soft spoken. Explains the situation and process of treatment very nicely. My mother is 80 who underwent the treatment and Dr Siddhi handled her with great care. We are very much satisfied and acknowledge her humble nature and politeness which is becoming rare nowadays. Would surely like people to visit her for any Dental treatment. She is too good and her clinic is very neat and clean ‚ò∫Ô∏è. Best wishes to her üëç
reply_text: Thank you for your appreciation and kind words ..

review:
Dr siddhi was extremely professional and cautious  while performing her duties and keeps the patient's comfort as her highest priority...
  I visited her during in this lockdown period and the level of precautions was off the charts... From shoe covers to hair caps ,gloves, plastic aprons were provided...
   I highly recommend her to everyone looking for a dentist...
reply_text: Thank you Mark for your kind words..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Siddhi with a really bad tooth ache. She did a complete analysis and explained the cause of the pain and the required treatment in detail. This was very helpful for me as I was a bit hesitant. But the root canal was completely painless. She also gave me some useful tips on dental care. I would definitely recommend her to my friends and family.
reply_text: Thank you Gabriel for your appreciation and kind words.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,

review: Doctor was friendly kind patient and explained the treatment and made the effort to get my alignment correctly

review: my elder brother recommended me to dr Siddhi Saijan. first thing she explains well to your problem and treat according. well equipped machine along with cleanliness. Her experience and skill really satisfied my treatment. Thanks dr. Siddhi Saijan and I recommend to visit her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Absolutely top-notch experience.  Dr Siddhi is, without exaggeration, the best dentist I have been to, and I will definitely be going only to her for all of my forthcoming dental requirements.  Appointments scheduled perfectly on time, very clean clinic and totally comprehensive COVID precautions.  Dr Siddhi deserves the highest possible recommendation!
reply_text: Thank you for such a kind review.. We really appreciate you taking time out to write this review..Thank you for trusting our practice..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor explained the nature of the dental problem with the help of the x-rays taken and so was able to understand well.  Was very gentle during the course of the treatment. Was made to feel very comfortable and there was no pain throughout the treatment and thereafter. Very satisfied with the treatment. Crown cap fitted perfectly. Clinic very clean, tidy and sanitized. Covid precautionary measures  carried out very well to ensure safety.
reply_text:
Thank you for your appreciation and kind words, and for an opportunity to provide care for your 
dental needs ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Siddhi Saijan is a very humble and kind human being. She always explained me the treatment process in detail so I never had doubts in my mind. She has advanced equipment and technology. I never seen before these kind of tools and machinery. I always recommend her to my friends or family. Her treatments always satisfied me. 
Thanks to her.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words , It always motivates us to serve you better..
